alert.note: Alert for Coconino Plateau; Yavapai County Mountains; Yavapai County Valleys and Basins (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 13 at 11:57AM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Coconino and Yavapai Counties near and east of Seligman through 1230 PM MST... At 1156 AM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Seligman, or 38 miles northwest of Chino Valley, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Seligman. This includes the following highways... Business Interstate 40 between mile markers 140 and 141. Interstate 40 between mile markers 121 and 139. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Coconino Plateau; Yavapai County Mountains; Yavapai County Valleys and Basins
